channel.title: Cause of nulls?
channel.description:
I know what they are but can people post some of the things that can make nulls? Just so i know what not to f*** up.
Also, does adding wepeons as platebodies and legs make them? Because that might be the reason i have so many..

item.title: Cause of nulls?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

They have to remove this gay ass code from the run method.

if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) {
//shutdownError(“Expected login Id 14 from client.”);
disconnected = true;
return;
}

More stuff is also there to stop nulls. But you got to put it.

Read full topic

item.title: Cause of nulls?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:13, topic:159706”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=217416.msg1892105#msg1892105 date=1195780328]
For basicismn, in side the run method in class Client, where it has the line like;
PlayerSave playerSave = new
Etc, where it instantiates a new object, under that add something;
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“null”)) {
playerName = “_”;
disconnected = true;
returnCode = 4;
}

[/quote]

Thats always been in the run method though.

But like this :

if(playerName == null || playerName.length() == 0)
disconnected = true;[/quote]
Oh. >.<

Read full topic

Etc, where it instantiates a new object, under that add something;
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“null”)) {

disconnected = true;
returnCode = 4;
}[/quote]

Thats always been in the run method though.

But like this :

if(playerName == null || playerName.length() == 0)
disconnected = true;

item.title: Cause of nulls?

item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Ahh i had the before, was a pain like a bitch. whatever you did to your server involving the equipment menu, undo it now. Thats what i had to do, and i had to wait till the next day because it still crashed my client.

item.title: Cause of nulls?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I added whips as all the armour etc, And i logged on to see if everything was alright and since the whips were there, i couldnt click the equipment menu, when i did the client froze up and dced.

Read full topic

item.title: Cause of nulls?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Bad disconnecting of players causes em, When a server status checks if your server is on, Better coding will help prevent it. Lemme look at your run method.
